comments:
I cannot decide whether or not it's an Hyades bug or an osgi bug.
I'm using IES-I20040506-win32-no-hyades.zip with hyades.runtime_3.
0_20040517_2326.zip.
I'm filing because I haven't found another bug related to this.
Feel free to invalidate it if it's something known or already fixed of course.

Here is the log emitted at workbench shutdown:

Dominique, how did you produce the problem?

Unable to reproduce. Was there anything specific you did that may have caused 
this?

I'm not doing anything really specific or unusual.
This happens when the runtime workbench closes, not the workbench itself, but in 
the workbench I'm not using the profiling perspective.
If you cannot reproduce it with an earlier IES, it's probably to be classified 
as WORKSFORME (I mean for you :-).
Thanks.
Marking as WORKSFORME for now.. to be reopened if consistently reproducible.
